trans-unit.resname: ARC·22 | Reassembling Skeleton | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: ARC·32 | Chandra's Outrage | Card Name
ARC·32 | Chandra's Outrage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成4点伤害，且对该生物的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: ARC·116 | Sorcerer's Strongbox | Card Name
ARC·116 | Sorcerer's Strongbox | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, sacrifice CARDNAME and draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：掷一枚硬币。 若你赢得此掷，则牺牲CARDNAME并抓三张牌。
